data.description:
🎮 **A super fun zombie shooter** 🧟 - GingasVR

👾 **The Flip is the perfect game!** 🌟 - turbotek_td

👀 **The biggest hordes yet to be seen on the Quest headset** 🕶️ - Mac in VR

🤝 **A great multiplayer experience** 🎉 - FluffySez


**The Flip** is the cooperative VR shooter you’ve been waiting for! Flip City is overrun with the undead and it’s up to intrepid survivors to blast through the hordes. Filled with ravenous nano-tech-infused zombie hordes, jump into missions solo or better yet, team up with friends. Using The Flip’s built-in voice chat you can easily coordinate with the group or just scream 😱 at them!

**Features:**

- 🤝 | **4 Player Co-op Fun** - Team up with 3 mates on epic 15-minute runs or make new friends in the 12-player lobbies!

- 🚀 | **Mission Overload!**- A mission DJ flips up levels and modifiers on constant rotation, giving you over 2,000 different missions to engage in.

- 🔫 | **A powerful arsenal** - Dual-wield Shotguns, SMGs, Grenade launchers and more!

- 🎚️ | **Dynamic Difficulty** - The more you play the larger the hordes get. Pick a mission and hope for the best!

- 🧟 | **Mission Masochist** - Choose from “Standard” or “Special” missions that let you dive into ‘Ultra Hardcore’ missions - or just build up XP in the explosive “Dook Nook” missions.

- 🎩 | **Dress for Success** - Successfully Exfil to gain XP and level up, unlocking new avatars and outfits!

- 🏠 | **Home Sweet Home** - Chill with your mates, play some basketball or customise your character before heading back in for more zombie guts!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974889_1849847062171244_2481398224504788830_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kq05bsku_BIQ7kNvgE7OYuy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAt0-AyZGMk_7hHxsdvECb4GS9qloThKlo6u_7gqYHzcw&oe=66F52A8F)

changelog.change_log:
v.1.74986233
- Improved notification of app updates so users are aware when new stuff is available
- Fix issues with helicopters not landing in the lobby

Update 1.74896227 - 19/04/2024
- Doubled turn speed for smooth turning
- Increased minimum difficulty level so new users see more zombies quicker!
